item.title: about me
item.description: Thanks for stopping by! I am currently a Geospatial Machine Learning Consultant at Thinking Machines Data Science where we wrangle geospatial data to produce clean, insightful maps and efficient AI models. Previously, I spent 3 years in the energy industry, developing and deploying market forecasting models to enhance renewable energy portfolios and providing weather/climate insights for plant operations. Before that, I trained as a climate scientist for 6 years, earning a Masters in Atmospheric Science from Ateneo de Manila University in 2019.

item.title: my works
item.description: An overview of my publications along with citation metrics can also be found on my Google Scholar profile. Mapping Portfolio I treat figure-making as an art and always go for minimally-sleek but maximally-functional designs. View my portfolio of maps here A series of maps for Tanauan, Leyte I prepared for the USAID-COLLABDev project Published Works Peralta J.C., Lim M., and Reyes R. (2023), Transport network efficiency during typhoon relief operations in the Visayas island group, Philippine Journal of Science 152(S1): 185–195.
